snippet: Residents had expressed dismay at the plans, saying that they had not been properly notified and feared crowds and delinquency in their neighborhood.
abstract: New York City agrees in settlement to withdraw plans to move criminal summons court to TriBeCa, after uproar and lawsuit by residents; those who lived in neighborhood said they have not been properly notified and feared crowds and delinquency.
lead_paragraph: Residents had expressed dismay at the plans, saying that they had not been properly notified and feared crowds and delinquency in their neighborhood.

headline.main: New York City Backs Off Moving Court to TriBeCa
headline.print_headline: City Backs Off Moving Court To TriBeCa
